body.name: Columbia Classic
body.stockDetail: Only 4 left in stock - order soon.
features: STYLE: Military belt is a timeless classic that every men and boys should have in his closet; Our Columbia belt is your new go;to; The type of accessory that you can rely on in any occasion; From barbequing, to camping, enjoy your new favorite belt

SIZE & COLOR: Either it's for Boy's or Men's, our military web belts come in one size that fits all; Strap width is 1 1/2 inches so it can easily pass through your pants loop; Adjust your belt easily by sliding the strap through the buckle

COLUMBIA QUALITY: Columbia is a trusted and recognized American brand; Our products are made to fit your day to day activities but also when grab your bag to go on an adventure; When buying a Columbia product, you know that you are buying quality

COLUMBIA WARRANTY: At Columbia, we only source best;in;class material to manufacture our high;quality products; This dress belt is no exception and offers you a long;lasting accessory that you can rely on and can wear with proud at work
body.description: Columbia sportswear is famous for its high quality and great style. Dress for business, casual or sports with this versatile Columbia belt

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great belt ,good quality . This seller is 66% higher than a local retailer on this product
reviews.reviewText: Price here is 34 bucks. Instead I bought it for a third of the price at a stone and brick store . They had a sale and I got 2 for 18.99 out the door.Gotta do better Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Belt for Motorcycle Riding
reviews.reviewText: Love this belt … I’ve always used the non-stretch belts with holes punched, but this belt totally obsoletes that design with infinite adjustment settings. The stretch aspect makes it ultra comfortable, especially in combination with stretchy motorcycle pants that I wear. It’s plenty wide and rigid to prevent the top of my pants from rolling, and it accommodates my Urbancarry holster perfectly. Super easy to adjust.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great military style-clasped belt
reviews.reviewText: I love belts that are very adjustable, like the military style buckle belts, like this one.I was concerned with the width being too wide. I have another Jeans brand belt, just like this, the exact width that I can't wear because it digs into my stomach. Material too stiff.This belt doesn't have that issue at all. Been wearing it constantly. It's soft, but a bit stretchy and supportive, and a nice looking buckle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and inexpensive
reviews.reviewText: I have three of these elastic belts. They are inexpensive, comfortable, and durable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stretchiness Makes All The Difference
reviews.reviewText: I have always liked these textile belts that don't rely on holes to set the size. I am always in between holes it seems...This seems like a high-quality belt and buckle that can be trimmed to the length you prefer. For me, the best part is the fact that the belt stretches just a bit. This is nice since it works to keep your pants up and gives you that "professional" look without the irritation when you sit.Overall, this is a nice, simple, comfortable belt that I would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the upgrade
reviews.reviewText: After reading the poor reviews on the cheaper model's broken buckle problems, I upgraded. A pleasant surprise was that the buckle is more of a smoke or gunmetal gray than the chrome appearance in the product pictures. Even my review picture shows the buckle as being brighter than it really appears to the naked eye, which may be the result of automatic low light camera adjustments, angle, etc. Most importantly, no mechanical problems yet to speak of.The stretch belt that comes with the upgrade is just okay. Elasticity wasn't a feature I was looking for, but I knew what I was getting into, so no lost points there. As far as cutting the belt to size, I haven't yet. A little extra slack has a swashbuckling Han Solo vibe to it. We'll see how long the vibe lasts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not exactly what I ordered.
reviews.reviewText: I ordered two of supposedly the same belts just different colors. They had different buckles and closed a little differently. Both were way too long.The website said to order a belt two inches bigger than your waist size.I ordered 34 inch belts and received 46 inch belts.I did cut them so they fit but still....

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice belt at a nice price!
reviews.reviewText: For $12 this is an awesome belt. The belt has several inches of flex really fits my ‘Dad Bod’ waist really well. The belt can also be adjusted to any size below the max and I have not had any issues with the buckle holding. Only downside is that to me it does not work with nicer clothes like dress pants.

reviews.reviewTitle: Es más flexible que los que había comprado antes.
reviews.reviewText: Es más flexible que los que había comprado antes. Eso hace que se ajuste mejor a la cintura y el pantalón quede mejor sujeto.

reviews.reviewTitle: Super easy to size and perfect strength
reviews.reviewText: Looks great with suit and tie, or on jeans! Very easy to size, the belt buckle is fantastic - just snaps closed to hold the belt in place. Here's what I LOVE about it - when I need to adjust my belt after a meal, or when driving, or when standing, etc., I used to have to remove the whole strap end, pull the belt out of the buckle, and put it on again fitting it into the next hole.No more! Now to adjust I simply open the clasp, slide the belt one way or the other, and snap shut again! I LOVE it!

reviews.reviewTitle: Best belt I have ever used.

reviews.reviewText: Trae un práctico abre botellas por la parte de atrás , en general el cinto es muy cómodo , está bien hecho ,se mira de calidad en materiales
